Heloísa Jorge (a mụrụ na 1 Julaị 1984) bụ onye Angola na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi ihe nkiri.
A mụrụ ya na obodo Chitato, na Lunda Norte Province, Jorge bụ nwa nwanyị nke nna Brazil na nne Angola, o nwekwara nwanne nwoke

Ọ kọwara onwe ya dịka nwatakịrị na-eme ihere nke nwere nsogbu ikwu okwu n'ihu ọha. Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Brazil iji gbanahụ Agha Obodo Angola, buru ụzọ biri na Montes Claros. Jorge malitere ịgụ ihe nkiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ wee bụrụ akụkụ nke otu
Mgbe ọ gara ule ịbanye na mahadum Brazil mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, o kpebiri ịmụ nka
Jorge kwagara Salvador, Bahia ịga Mahadum Federal nke Bahia
Mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri ya, Jorge malitere ịmụta banyere mmegharị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ma melite ùgwù onwe ya
N'afọ 2007, a họpụtara ya maka Braskem Award maka arụmọrụ ya na egwuregwu O Dia 14, nke Ângelo Flávio duziri

N'afọ 2007, Jorge dere egwuregwu Uma Mulher Vestida de Sol, iji sọpụrụ Ariano Suassuna. Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere nka n'afọ 2008. N'afọ 2009, a họpụtara Jorge ọzọ maka Braskem Award maka arụmọrụ ya na A Farsa da Boa Preguiça, nke Harildo Deda duziri. Ọ laghachiri Angola n'afọ 2009 na otu ihe nkiri ya, na-eme egwuregwu Amêsa nke José Mena Abrantes.
N'afọ 2012, a họpụtara Jorge dịka Fabiana na usoro TV Gabriela A kpọrọ ya ka ọ sonye na usoro ihe nkiri TV nke Angola bụ Jikulumessu, nke kwalitere ike ojii, n'afọ 2014

N'otu afọ ahụ, Jorge kwadoro mmemme Globo International Connections. N'afọ 2016, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ohu Luanda na ihe ngosi Liberdade, Liberdade Jorge gosipụtara nne na-anwụ anwụ Gilda Cunha Matheus n'afọ 2019 soap opera A Dona do Pedaço
